data.text: @Logetastic @seanny_mc @CBCNB Of course you can choose. Wear a mask and/or stay home.
@JDubya220 @CBCNB Getting Covid is worse than getting prosecuted I think. Plus Scripture tells us to obey the Laws/rules of the land. How can I trust this church that disobeys ?
@CBCNB Useless nonsense to continue to drag this through the courts. Regulations have ended, no one got hurt, case should be closed.
@Logetastic @seanny_mc @CBCNB Give me one case where someone has been infected by the virus from attending this church? If you have none you should be silent.

@seanny_mc @CBCNB What about the right of people infected by those who spread the virus?
What happened to getting to choose what goes in your body?
@CBCNB Hard to convict people of crimes that aren't really crimes and just violations of their rights.
@CBCNB Brutal...there have been no teeth to any prosecutions of COVID related violations in most provinces. No wonder no one cares...
@CBCNB Well of course they do. And the church will portray this as a win, despite flagrant violation of the court order and lying to the judge.
